title: Life in the ocean
creator_credit: Paul Burnford and Film Associates of California
brief_description: The many types of living things found in the sea are described, with emphasis on the relationships of these marine plants and animals to each other and to similar living things on land. The film was shot from inside an oceanarium in the Pacific Ocean and shows the various creatures in great detail.
